Verses: 1 levikkup Pirandha Kokaaththin Kumaaranaagiya Idhseyaarin Magan Koraaku Enbavan Rooban Vamsaththilulla Eliyaapin Kumaararaagiya Thaaththaanaiyum Apraamaiyum Peleththin Kumaaranaagiya Onaiyum Koottikkondu,
2 isravel Puththiraril Sabaikkuth Thalaivargalum Sangaththukku Azhaikkappattavargalum Prabalamaanavargalumaagiya Irunootru Aimbadhu Pergalodumkooda Mosekkumunbaaga Ezhumbi,

3 mosekkum Aaronukkum Virodhamaagak Koottankoodi, Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Minjippogireergal; Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Parisuththamaanavargal; Karththar Avargal Naduvil Irukkiraare; Ippadiyirukka, Karththarudaiya Sabaikku Melaaga Ungalai En Uyarththugireergal Endraargal.
4 mose Adhaik Kettapodhu, Mugankuppura Vizhundhaan.

5 pinbu Avan Koraagaiyum Avanudaiya Ellaak Koottaththaiyum Nokki: Naalaikkuk Karththar Thammudaiyavan Innaan Endrum, Thammandaiyile Serath Thaam Kattalaiyitta Parisuththavaan Innaan Endrum Kaanbippaar; Appozhudhu Evanaith Therindhukolvaaro, Avanaith Thammidaththil Serak Kattalaiyiduvaar.
6 ondru Seyyungal; Koraake, Koraakin Koottaththaargale, Neengal Ellaarum Thoobakalasangalai Eduththukkondu,

7 naalaikku Avaigalil Akkinipottu, Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Thoobavarkkam Idungal; Appozhudhu Karththar Evanaith Therindhukolvaaro, Avan Parisuththavaanaayiruppaan; Leviyin Puththiraraagiya Neengale Minjippogireergal Endraan.
8 pinnum Mose Koraagai Nokki: Leviyin Puththirare, Kelungal;

9 karththarudaiya Vaasasthalaththin Panividaigalai Seyyavum, Sabaiyaarin Mun Nindru Avargal Seyyavendiya Velaigalai Seyyavum, Ungalaith Thammandaiyile Serappannumpadi Isravelin Dhevan Isravel Sabaiyaarilirundhu Ungalaip Piriththeduththadhum,
10 avar Unnaiyum Unnodekooda Leviyin Puththiraraagiya Unnudaiya Ellaa Sagodhararaiyum Serappanninadhum, Ungalukku Arpakaariyamo? Ippozhudhu Aasaariyappattaththaiyum Thedugireergalo?
11 idharkaaga Neeyum Un Koottaththaar Anaivarum Karththarukku Virodhamaagave Koottankoodineergal; Aaronukku Virodhamaaga Neengal Murumurukkiradharku Avan Emmaaththiram Endraan.
12 pinbu Mose Eliyaapin Kumaararaagiya Thaaththaanaiyum Apraamaiyum Azhaiththanuppinaan. Avargal: Naangal Varugiradhillai;
13 indha Vanaandharaththil Engalaik Kondrupodumpadi, Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesaththilirundhu Engalaik Konduvandhadhu Arpakaariyamo, Engalmel Thuraiththanamum Pannappaarkkiraayo?

14 melum Nee Engalaip Paalum Thenum Odugira Dhesaththukkuk Konduvandhadhum Illai, Engalukku Vayalgalaiyum Dhraatchaththottangalaiyum Sudhandharamaagak Koduththadhum Illai; Indha Manidharudaiya Kangalaip Pidungappaarkkiraayo? Naangal Varugiradhillai Endraargal.

15 appozhudhu Mosekkuk Kadunkobam Moondadhu; Avan Karththarai Nokki: Avargal Seluththun Kaanikkaiyai Angigariyaadhiruppeeraaga; Naan Avargalidaththil Oru Kazhudhaiyai Mudhalaai Eduththukkollavillai; Avargalil Oruvanukkum Yaadhoru Pollaappu Seyyavum Illai Endraan.
16 pinbu Mose Koraagai Nokki: Neeyum Un Koottaththaar Yaavarum Naalaikkuk Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Vaarungal; Neeyum Avargalum Aaronum Vandhirungal.

17 ungalil Ovvoruvarum Thangal Thangal Thoobakalasangalai Eduththu, Avaigalil Thoobavarkkaththaip Pottu, Thangal Thangal Thoobakalasangalaagiya Irunootru Aimbadhu Thoobakalasangalaiyum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Konduvaravendum; Neeyum Aaronum Than Than Thoobakalasaththaik Konduvaarungal Endraan.

18 appadiye Avaravar Thangal Thangal Thoobakalasangalai Eduththu, Avaigalil Akkiniyaiyum Thoobavarkkaththaiyum Pottu, Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalukku Munbaaga Vandhu Nindraargal; Moseyum Aaronum Ange Nindraargal.
19 avargalukku Virodhamaagak Koraaku Sabaiyaiyellaam Aasarippukkoodaara Vaasalukku Munbaagak Koodivarumbadi Seydhaan; Appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Magimai Sabaikkellaam Kaanappattadhu.
20 karththar Moseyodum Aaronodum Pesi:
21 indha Sabaiyai Vittup Pirindhupongal; Oru Nimishaththile Avargalai Adhamaakkuven Endraar.
22 appozhudhu Avargal Mugankuppuravizhundhu: Dhevane, Maamsamaana Yaavarudaiya Aavigalukkum Dhevane, Oru Manidhan Paavam Seydhirukka Sabaiyaar Ellaarmelum Kadunkobankolveero Endraargal.
23 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
24 koraaku Thaaththaan Apraam Enbavargaludaiya Vaasasthalaththai Vittu Vilagippongal Endru Sabaiyaarukku Sol Endraar.
25 udane Mose Ezhundhirundhu, Thaaththaan Apraam Enbavargalidaththil Ponaan; Isravelin Moopparum Avanaip Pinsendru Ponaargal.

26 avan Sabaiyaarai Nokki Indhath Dhushtamanidharin Sagala Paavangalilum Neengal Vaarikkollappadaadhapadikku, Avargal Koodaarangalai Vittu Vilagi, Avargalukku Undaanavaigalil Ondraiyum Thodaadhirungal Endraan.

27 appadiye Avargal Koraaku Thaaththaan Apraam Enbavargaludaiya Vaasasthalaththai Vittu Vilagipponaargal; Thaaththaanum Apraamum Veliye Vandhu, Thangal Penjaadhigal Pillaigal Kuzhandhaigalodum Thangal Koodaaravaasalile Nindraargal.
28 appozhudhu Mose: Indhak Kiriyaigalaiyellaam Seygiradharkuk Karththar Ennai Anuppinaar Endrum, Avaigalai Naan En Manadhinpadiye Seyyavillai Endrum, Neengal Edhinaale Ariveergalendraal,
29 sagala Manidharum Saagirapadi Ivargal Seththu, Sagala Manidharukkum Neridugiradhupola Ivargalukkum Nerittaal, Karththar Ennai Anuppavillai Endru Ariveergal.

30 karththar Oru Pudhiya Kaariyaththai Neridachcheyvadhaal, Boomi Than Vaayaith Thirandhu, Ivargal Uyirode Paadhaalaththil Irangaththakkadhaaga Ivargalaiyum Ivargalukku Undaana Yaavaiyum Vizhungippottadheyaanaal, Indha Manidhar Karththarai Avamadhiththaargal Enbadhai Arindhukolveergal Endraan.
31 avan Indha Vaarththaigalaiyellaam Solli Mudiththavudane, Avargal Nindrirundha Nilam Pilandhadhu;
32 boomi Than Vaayaith Thirandhu, Avargalaiyum Avargal Veedugalaiyum, Koraakukkuriya Ellaa Manidharaiyum, Avargalukku Undaana Sagala Porulgalaiyum Vizhungippottadhu.
33 avargal Thangalukku Undaanavai Ellaavatrodum Uyirode Paadhaalaththil Iranginaargal; Boomi Avargalai Moodikkondadhu; Ippadi Sabaiyin Naduvilirundhu Azhindhuponaargal.
34 avargalai Sutrilum Irundha Isravelar Yaavarum Avargal Kookkuralaikkettu, Boomi Nammaiyum Vizhungippodum Endru Solli Odinaargal.
35 akkini Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyilirundhu Purappattu, Thoobankaattina Irunootru Aimbadhu Peraiyum Patchiththuppottadhu.
36 pinbu Karththar Moseyai Nokki:

37 akkinikkul Agappatta Thoobakalasangalai Eduththu, Avaigalilirukkira Akkiniyai Appaale Kottippodumpadi Aasaariyanaagiya Aaronin Kumaaran Eleyaasaarukku Sol; Andhath Thoobakalasangal Parisuththamaayina.

38 thangal Aaththumaakkalukke Kedundaakkina Andhap Paavigalin Thoobakalasangalaip Palipeedaththai Moodaththakka Thattaiyaana Thagadugalaai Adikkakkadavargal; Avargal Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Avaigalaik Konduvandhadhinaal Avaigal Parisuththamaayina; Avaigal Isravel Puththirarukku Oru Adaiyaalamaayirukkum Endraar.
39 appadiye Aasaariyanaagiya Eleyaasaar Sutterikkappattavargal Konduvandhirundha Vengalath Thoobakalasangalai Eduththu,

40 aaronin Puththiraraai Iraadha Anniyan Oruvanum Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyil Thoobangaatta Varaadhapadikkum, Koraagaippolum Avan Koottaththaaraippolum Iraadhapadikkum, Isravel Puththirarukku Gnaabagakkuriyaayirukkumporuttu, Karththar Moseyaikkondu Thanakku Sonnapadiye Avaigalaip Palipeedaththai Moodum Thagadugalaaga Adippiththaan.
41 marunaalil Isravel Puththirarin Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Mosekkum Aaronukkum Virodhamaaga Murumuruththu: Neengal Karththarin Janangalaik Kondrupotteergal Endraargal.
42 sabaiyaar Mosekkum Aaronukkum Virodhamaagak Koodi Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukku Nere Paarkkirapodhu, Megam Adhai Moodinadhu, Karththarin Magimai Kaanappattadhu.
43 moseyum Aaronum Aasarippuk Koodaaraththukku Munbaaga Vandhaargal.
44 appozhudhu Karththar Moseyai Nokki:
45 indha Sabaiyaarai Vittu Vilagippongal; Oru Nimishaththil Avargalai Adhamaakkuven Endraar; Avargal Mugankuppura Vizhundhaargal.

46 mose Aaronai Nokki: Nee Thoobakalasaththai Eduththu, Palipeedaththilirukkira Akkiniyai Adhil Pottu, Adhinmel Thoobavarkkam Ittu, Seekkiramaai Sabaiyinidaththil Poi, Avargalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Sey; Karththarudaiya Sannidhiyilirundhu Kadunkobam Purappattadhu, Vaadhai Thodangitru Endraan.
47 mose Sonnapadi Aaron Adhai Eduththukkondu Sabaiyin Naduvil Odinaan; Janangalukkulle Vaadhai Thodangiyirundhadhu; Avan Thoobavarkkam Pottu, Janangalukkaagap Paavanivirththi Seydhu,
48 seththavargalukkum Uyirodirukkiravargalukkum Naduve Nindraan; Appozhudhu Vaadhai Niruththappattadhu.
49 koraakin Kaariyaththinimiththam Seththavargal Thavira, Andha Vaadhaiyinaal Seththupponavargal Padhinaalaayiraththu Ezhunooruper.
50 vaadhai Niruththappattadhu; Appozhudhu Aaron Aasarippuk Koodaaravaasalukku Moseyinidaththil Thirumbivandhaan.
